summary: I am a historian of the United States who has published widely on post-1945 U.S. foreign policy. From 2023 - 2027 I will be the principal investigator on "American foreign policy and liberalism", a research project funded with nearly â‚¬1m from the Dutch Research Council. I comment frequently on American politics and foreign policy in the media, writing regularly for The Guardian and hosting America Explained, a podcast about American politics, foreign policy and culture aimed at an international audience. I also write a newsletter of the same name.
